description: Raditz works alongside http://anidb.net/ch2105 [Vegeta] and http://anidb.net/ch11415 [Nappa], and is essentially a warrior in http://anidb.net/ch9009 [Freezer]`s army. While working on a team led by http://anidb.net/ch2105 [Vegeta], Raditz traveled to Earth to find out if http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Gokuu] had finished the mission that he was sent on as a baby: the overthrow of Earth.
name: Raditz
